newsitem.title: USA: US banks free rsrv $1.226 bln/day May 7 rvsd 2 wks.
newsitem.headline: US banks free rsrv $1.226 bln/day May 7 rvsd 2 wks.

text.p: U.S. commercial banks had revised free reserves of $1.226 billion per day in the two weeks ended May 7, versus revised free reserves of $439 million in the previous two-week period, the Federal Reserve said.
Seasonal borrowings were $127 million versus $86 million a day. Extended credits were nil.
